QuestData.Title: A Bundle of Hides
QuestData.Description: I have a bundle of hides from the animals of Mulgore, and must get them to Thunder Bluff. A colleague there, Ahanu, will use the hides to create leather goods.$B$BWill you take the hides to him for me?$B$BThe quickest way to Thunder Bluff is on the back of a wind rider. Bring the bundle of hides to Tak, our wind rider master in Bloodhoof Village, and speak to him about transport to Thunder Bluff.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Bundle of Hides to the wind rider master Tak in Bloodhoof Village.
QuestData.CompletionText: Are you here for a wind rider? You have something to transport?
QuestData.RewardText: If you must take these hides to Thunder Bluff, then you have come to the right place.
